column2: b'Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama - Hajimari no Zenya'

b"A special included with the Blu-Ray release of the main series. Lelouch monologues on his dissatisfaction with Britannia's rule and the need to hide his and Nunnally's connection to the Britannian throne.\n\n(Source: Wikipedia)"
[b'Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch', b'Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama']
